```
#include <stdio.h>

  

int main() {

     // for decimal number

    double age =6.45;

   // Print the variable

    printf("Age is %lf, age);

    return 0;
}
```


```
##output
Age is 6.450000
```


![Idea Emoji](data:image/png;base64,)
Note: To print the specific numbers of info after decimal we use %.3lf
here if we use %.3lf we will get result up to 3 number after decimal and if we use %.5lf we will get 5 number after decimal..so getinng desired number after decimal we can do this
